about_the_game:
A game where you play as a slightly confused bear trying to assemble the ultimate meal no matter who tries to get in your way. Relax and go fishing, visit the grocery store, escape shadowy agents, and more on your way to achieve enlightenment via sandwich.

Sandwich Sim is primarily a first person game whose main mechanic is moving and manipulating your hands to grab, move, and release items using your mouse.
The game features full voice acting and subtitles, and a compelling and captivating story.

This game was developed by a team of UCI students and graduates in 2024. The in game computer also contains a playable version of Sugar Bear which was developed by many of the same students for a game jam in 2023.
